content.heroIntro: GRECIA II represents a exceptional opportunity to own a modern, well-designed bungalow in the heart of La Finca Golf, Algorfa. Developed by TRIVEE, a trusted name in Costa Blanca property development, this exclusive project offers just 3 units of high-quality 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom bungalows starting from €315,000. Located on the prestigious La Finca Golf resort, GRECIA II combines the lifestyle benefits of an international golf community with proximity to stunning Mediterranean beaches and major amenities. With delivery expected on 01-01-2026, this is your chance to secure a contemporary home in one of Alicante's most sought-after golf destinations. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday retreat, or investment property with strong rental potential, GRECIA II delivers exceptional value in a thriving market showing +12% year-on-year growth.

locationSection.intro: La Finca Golf is one of the Costa Blanca's most prestigious residential golf communities, situated in the charming inland town of Algorfa, Alicante. This exclusive destination seamlessly blends championship golf facilities with Mediterranean living, attracting an international community of golf enthusiasts and expatriates. Algorfa offers a peaceful alternative to crowded coastal towns while maintaining excellent accessibility to beaches, healthcare, shopping, and dining. The resort atmosphere provides a secure, well-maintained environment with English-speaking amenities and services. Residents enjoy direct access to La Finca Golf's championship course, plus proximity to several other world-class golf courses in the region. The area's strategic location makes it ideal for those seeking a balanced lifestyle: close enough to beaches and major towns for convenience, yet nestled in a tranquil setting perfect for relaxation and golf.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in GRECIA II?
faqs.answer: Properties start from €315,000. Each bungalow features 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with 73m² of built space. Only 3 units are available in this exclusive project. Contact us for current pricing and availability.

faqs.question: When will GRECIA II be completed?
faqs.answer: GRECIA II is scheduled for delivery on 01-01-2026. TRIVEE provides a 10-year structural warranty on all new builds. Specific completion dates for individual units can be confirmed when reserving.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of GRECIA II?
faqs.answer: TRIVEE is the developer, an established and reputable company with significant experience building quality residential properties throughout the Costa Blanca region, particularly in golf and resort communities.

faqs.question: Is Algorfa a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Algorfa is an excellent location for property investment and residence. The international golf community provides a vibrant, English-friendly environment. Property values show consistent growth at +12% year-on-year. Key advantages include proximity to Guardamar beaches (15 min), Hospital de Torrevieja (20 min), excellent golf facilities, and significantly lower prices than coastal alternatives.

faqs.question: How far is GRECIA II from the beach?
faqs.answer: GRECIA II is approximately 15 minutes by car from Guardamar's beautiful beaches, and 20 minutes from La Mata Beach. This proximity offers perfect balance—close enough for weekend beach days while maintaining the peaceful golf-resort atmosphere.

faqs.question: What amenities are near GRECIA II?
faqs.answer: Excellent nearby amenities include: La Finca Golf on-site, local shops in Algorfa village, Mercadona supermarket (10 min in Rojales), Hospital de Torrevieja (20 min), El Limonar school (25 min), and multiple restaurants. Alicante Airport is 30 minutes away.
